categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic droids

nodes.text: R5-G19 was an R5 series astromech droid that served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. In 4 ABY, the astromech droid was stood beside another astromech in the briefing room of the MC80 Star Cruiser Home One when members of the Alliance High Command, including Admiral Gial Ackbar, Mon Mothma, and General Crix Madine, gave a briefing to the assembled rebels on their plans to attack the Empire's Death Star II superweapon in the Endor system. The Home One later took part in the successful attack.
R5-G19 stood 97 centimeters tall and as an R-series droid was manufacturered by Industrial Automaton. It had black sensors and white and burgundy plating.

R5-G19 was created for the 1983 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The briefing room scene was filmed on Stage 5 at Elstree Studios between February 12 and February 25 in 1982. The droid was first identified in 2014 when it received an action figure in the Star Wars: The Black Series line released by Hasbro.
